TopicTitle: Suggestion: Add "Warp To" buttons next to 'Ap' and 'Pe' information in Flight UI on the bottom left

Articles.Content:
These buttons would allow for fast interaction with any celestial body's Apogee and Perigee without the need to go into Map View, click on the orbit and select the warp to option. I think these would make the gameplay loop way, way smoother for most missions in general, minimizing the time the user has to spend jumping from map to flight view.
